text:
The Astrazeneca is safe and effective to use. Its benefits outweight risks.  Not  linked to a raised risk of blood clots. Emer Cooke, EMA
La vacuna AstraZeneca es segura y efectiva para su uso, beneficio supera riesgo. No relacionada con riesgo de trombosis. #COVID19 #vaccine #AZ https://t.co/u4pvlbuQ72
